document_data.name: Belron Strongstep
document_data.mainbody:
'''Belron Strongstep''' was a commoner from the [[Rivington]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''What're you hanging about for? Head into the city - before they shut the gates for good.''|Belron Strongstep}}
document_data.Description: Belron was a [[gold dwarf]] with a dusky complexion. He wore his dark brown hair under a [[skullcap]] and facial hair shortly-trimmed. He had dwarvishly bushy eyebrows and hazelnut eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Belron Strongstep could often be seen conversing with a fellow commoner [[Arne Jacobson]] on the streets of Rivington, discussing the [[Cult of the Absolute]] and the refugee crisis that affected the [[Outer City]].
